cast.name: 阿尔缅·哲加尔哈尼扬 Armen Dzhigarkhanyan

writer.name: 埃德蒙·科萨扬 Edmond Keosayan

director.name: 埃德蒙·科萨扬 Edmond Keosayan

introduction: Azariy is a soldier who comes back home from war to live in his old house right at the Lost Fairy Tales Abyss. His friends and neighbors one by one leave this place and have better homes. But Azariy even alone finds thousands of ways to be happy when he can talk with trees and animals.After the war soldier Azaria with his beautiful wife Arpen have settled in his old house right near the canyon. Here, far from the crowdy places, the couple spent the severe post-war years bound by their friendship and fidelity. But their seemed-to-be normal life is interrupted by the arrival of geologist team to the canyon. Unable to accept the changes, Azaria returns back to the people, to the village, taking his dog, domesticated bear and deer with him.
